question: Which Metro station of India is to have the first She-Man station of North India with special facilities for transgenders?
explanation:
The Noida Metro Rail Corporation has announced its plan to convert Sector 50 metro station into a 'she-man' metro station.
Once implemented, this would be the first She-Man station of North India with special facilities for employment opportunities to the transgender community. This station will be on the lines of the Pink Metro stations. Though the ‘She-Man’ station will be open for all passengers, it will cater especially to the transgender passengers.
